p: For carbon, we compared live and dead carbon (C) pools, total ecosystem C stocks, net primary production (NPP), net ecosystem production (NEP), net biome production (NBP), and C consumed and emitted by fire (consumed C). Results for C pools and fluxes were summarized by taking mean values over the study area for five 30-year periods: early 20 th c. (1895–1924), mid 20 th c. (1936–1965), late 20 th c. (1971–2000), mid 21 st c. (2036–2065), and late 21 st c. (2071–2100).
